author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...BERYL FORECAST TO BRING DANGEROUS STORM SURGE, FLASH FLOODING AND STRONG WINDS TO TEXAS OVERNIGHT...
summary:
...BERYL FORECAST TO BRING DANGEROUS STORM SURGE, FLASH FLOODING AND STRONG WINDS TO TEXAS OVERNIGHT...
 As of 4:00 PM CDT Sun Jul 7
 the center of Beryl was located near 26.8, -95.5
 with movement NNW at 12 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 988 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.
